title: Language Proficiency Enhancement Training Utilizing Technology-Mediated Situated Learning (TML)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic language structures and familiarity with foundational terminology in relevant fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Learners develop expertise by collaborating with peers, receiving feedback, and performing language tasks based on practical contexts in non-real-time digital environments

learning_goals: Learners can utilize domain-specific terminology (medical/legal/technical) with 90% accuracy through practice-based scenario tasks
Learners strengthen communication skills by collaborating with peers to co-author documents and provide feedback ≥3 times using digital collaboration tools
Learners identify ≥5 situation-specific language application strategies through formative assessments and apply them to real-world tasks

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools (e.g., Google Docs, Padlet)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
